name: Cosmo Angel
overview: In the year 2888 an interstellar organization named Gammos began to terrorize space. Using a powerful new weapon known as GRAY-Q, Gammos launched an unprecedented assault on the headquarters of the Galactic Federation. The special government squad Cosmo Angel was assigned to infiltrate the Gammos base and destroy GRAY-Q. The agents in charge are a young woman named Lina and her ex-boyfriend Akira. Cosmo Angel is a text adventure with graphics. The player interacts with the environment by typing commands, most of which involve combinations of verbs and objects. The game contains scene with explicit nudity.
